com.ning.http.client.ntlm
Class NTLMEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.ning.http.client.ntlm.NTLMEngine

public class NTLMEngine
extends Object

Provides an implementation for NTLMv1, NTLMv2, and NTLM2 Session forms of the NTLM authentication protocol.

Since:
4.1
